articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Dewormer ivermectin as cancer cure? RFK Jr.'s NIH funds "absurd" study - Ars Technica
articles.description: There's no reason to think ivermectin cures cancer, but RFK Jr's NIH is on it anyway.

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Windows’ original Secure Boot certificates expire in June—here’s what you need to do - Ars Technica
articles.description: PCs without the new certificates could eventually have trouble booting new OSes.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: YouTube rolls out an AI playlist generator for Premium users - TechCrunch
articles.description: YouTube Music is rolling out a new AI-powered playlist-generation feature that allows Premium users on iOS and Android to use text prompts to create playlists.
articles.content:
YouTube is rolling out a new AI-powered playlist-generation feature that allows Premium users on iOS and Android to use text prompts to create playlists.
